99Nerds
  • 99Nerds!
  • Stickers

One sticker changes the world.

One sticker creates a bright development environment.

One sticker makes the developer laugh.

Each time a sticker is sold, it is 'sponsored as an open source project'

Opensource Sticker Mall

If you live the life of a developer, you will be using a lot of open source. Is it only me that I feel great gratitude and joy when the perspiration and effort of other developers are great inspiration and help in my development. On my desk, stick an open source sticker on my laptop. Small practice brightens the future of open source.
